detailsData.title: Personalized Approach
detailsData.content: Eason takes a hands-on approach and works hard to build a personal relationship with each client. He understands the unique challenges they may face, from low credit scores to personal and financial struggles.

detailsData.title: Extensive Experience
detailsData.content: Eason has 10 years of legal experience, including three years as a licensed practicing attorney in Illinois. He also worked for seven years as a paralegal on cases involving real estate, contract, and family law.

detailsData.title: Diverse Background
detailsData.content: Prior to his legal career, Eason worked in technology, business, and athletics for organizations like Coca-Cola and Deloitte. This diverse background enriches his legal practice.

detailsData.title: Community Focused
detailsData.content: Eason is committed to helping Chicago families work through family law challenges. His dedication to his own family reflects in his drive to protect the interests of his clients' children.

address: 10231 South Western Avenue, 1st Floor, Chicago, IL 60643
subHeading: Chicago Real Estate, Family Law, and Probate Attorney
valueProp:
Marques A. Eason is an attorney serving clients on the South Side of Chicago and throughout the South Suburbs in matters involving real estate property and a range of other legal issues. His areas of concentration include residential and commercial real estate closings, estate planning, and probate law.

Eason takes a hands-on approach and works hard to build a personal relationship with each client, understanding the unique challenges they may face. With 10 years of legal experience and a diverse background, Eason is committed to helping Chicago families navigate legal challenges and protect their interests.

testimonalData.text: Eason helped me close on my home after a year of hard work and dedication. I couldn't have done it without him.
testimonalData.author: Jane Doe

testimonalData.text: Marques Eason is a fantastic attorney who truly cares about his clients. He made the probate process so much easier for our family.
testimonalData.author: John Smith

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend Marques Eason for any real estate or estate planning needs. His expertise and commitment are unmatched.
testimonalData.author: Emily Johnson
